Home.sql: SELECT ID,NavigationName, ( SELECT p.ID+','+p.NavigationID+','+p.PowerName+','+p.MenuAddress+';' FROM dbo.MK_Info_PowerAllot pa JOIN MK_Type_Power p ON pa.PowerID = p.ID AND p.NavigationID = A.ID WHERE PowerGroupID = (SELECT PowerGroupID FROM dbo.MK_Info_User WHERE UserName = @UserName) AND pa.Status = '1' AND pa.ShowMark = 'Y' AND p.ShowMark = 'Y' ORDER BY p.NavigationID FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Menus, Tips,Directio FROM dbo.MK_Info_Navigationbar A WHERE A.ShowMark = 'Y'
